trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_SEQ_00<tab>Krile is eager to begin searching the research facility.
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_TODO_00<tab>Search for a way to the upper floor.
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_TODO_01<tab>Search for the verification key.
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_TODO_02<tab>Access the security panel.
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_TODO_03<tab>Speak with G'raha Tia.
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Shale in the Backroom.
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_WUKLAMAT_000_001<tab>Teeshal Ja, you said her name was? I wonder what her story is...
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_GULOOLJA_000_005<tab>Is it alright if I go around by myself now?
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_ALPHINAUD_000_010<tab>The villagers were likely monitoring the imprisoned tural vidraal at Zoraal Ja's behest. And at some point, they became involved in the research of souls...
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_ALISAIE_000_015<tab>Now that the danger is behind us, it's started sinking in just how unsettling this place is. Hard to believe it used to be a village.
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_GRAHATIA_000_020<tab>It seems this Kanilokka was in charge here. From your recounting, he was quite dedicated to Zoraal Ja.
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_KILUWSA_000_025<tab>I'll launch the hover cargo whenever you're ready. Just say the word.
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_SYSTEM_000_026<tab>Travel to Yuweyawata?
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_KRILE_000_030<tab>While we've discerned the purpose of the research conducted here, the traces of it that remain might afford us greater insight into what came of it.
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_KRILE_000_031<tab>Let us take a look around─for information as well as a way to the upper level.
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_WUKLAMAT_000_035<tab>It makes me angry to think about what they did here...
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_GULOOLJA_000_040<tab>What happened to the people here? Did they all leave...or did we already meet them?
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_ALPHINAUD_000_045<tab>To think that people actually volunteered their souls for these experiments...
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_ALPHINAUD_000_046<tab>Success was far from guaranteed, and even in the best case, they would cease to be men. Was their devotion to Zoraal Ja so absolute?
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_ALISAIE_000_050<tab>It won't open, and I don't think it'll yield to our shoulders either. We'll have to do it the old-fashioned way and find the key.
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_KRILE_000_055<tab>The researchers likely moved between the upper and lower levels. Perhaps we can find a key among their belongings.
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_GRAHATIA_000_060<tab>I wonder what Beq Lugg would make of this research into transferring souls.
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_SYSTEM_000_100<tab>A lift can be seen behind the wrought-iron gate. As sturdy as it appears, the gate will likely resist attempts to force it open.
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_SYSTEM_000_101<tab>A security panel is nearby. Perhaps a verification key will open the way.
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_SYSTEM_000_199<tab>A journal lies next to the body...

TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_BOOK05247A_000_200<tab>(-Researcher's Journal-)<var 1A 02 /var>I was transferred to Yuweyawata station in order to train the villagers in the use of electrope technology.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_BOOK05247A_100_200<tab>(-Researcher's Journal-)<var 1A 02 /var>While a child can quickly learn to operate common contraptions, it will be no easy thing for them to attain the requisite skill to develop new weapons─ones which require no less than the manipulation of souls.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_BOOK05247A_200_200<tab>(-Researcher's Journal-)<var 1A 02 /var>Thankfully, two of my pupils have demonstrated great aptitude in the field: Kanilokka, the village chief, and Teeshal Ja, a field chirurgeon.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_BOOK05247A_300_200<tab>(-Researcher's Journal-)<var 1A 02 /var>Further driven by their loyalty to our king, their growth has been remarkable. I dare to hope that, before long, they will be able to carry out their duties without further instruction, and I may be relieved of my duty.<var 1A 01 /var>
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_SYSTEM_000_200<tab>You find nothing that resembles a verification key. Perhaps you should search elsewhere.

TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_BOOK05247B_000_201<tab>(-Test Subject's Journal-)<var 1A 02 /var>They're recruiting volunteers for a new experiment. I know I'm not as bright as the others, but they wouldn't laugh at me if I was stronger than them. This might be my chance.<var 1A 01 /var>
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_BOOK05247B_100_201<tab>(-Test Subject's Journal-)<var 1A 02 /var>Soul transferred few days ago. I can write. Can write good, yes? I am good! Very good!<var 1A 01 /var>
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_BOOK05247B_200_201<tab>(-Test Subject's Journal-)<var 1A 02 /var>Getting hard to control strength. Today bit off hand of feeder. Cannot help it so strong.<var 1A 01 /var>
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_BOOK05247B_300_201<tab>(-Test Subject's Journal-)<var 1A 02 /var>Hungry. Always hungry. Cannot control. Eat. I must eat am eater must eat...<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_SYSTEM_000_202<tab>Supplies for the staff are neatly arranged within the cabinet. Among the various items is a manual outlining regulations and tranquilizing gas to be used in emergencies. You dig deeper...
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_SYSTEM_000_203<tab>...And find a verification key! Perhaps it can be used to open the iron gate.
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_ALISAIE_100_300<tab>You found the key? Great, I'll call the others.
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_ALISAIE_000_300<tab>It seems the key can be used to operate the lift as well. Up we go.
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_WUKLAMAT_000_301<tab>So this is the observatory.
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_WUKLAMAT_000_302<tab>I didn't expect it to be similar, but this is a far cry from the temple that held Valigarmanda.
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_GRAHATIA_000_303<tab>All the machinery appears to still be in operation. I expect there are auxiliary systems in place to ensure that monitoring can continue even in emergencies.
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_KRILE_000_304<tab>The warnings indicate various anomalies─related to the seal's failure, most likely. For a blessing, we managed to fell the beast before it could cause harm.
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_WUKLAMAT_000_305<tab>Right then, let's see if we can find some clues about Gulool Ja's mother.
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_GULOOLJA_000_306<tab>I think I can use this terminal. Shale taught me how.
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_GULOOLJA_000_307<tab>There's so much data... I don't know what we should look at.
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_GRAHATIA_000_308<tab>Perhaps we can narrow down the search by inputting the name Teeshal Ja.
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_GULOOLJA_000_309<tab>Ah, it brought up a lot of results. They all seem to say the same thing...
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_GULOOLJA_000_310<tab>“Teeshal Ja, Administrator of Experimental Treatments: Research Logs.”
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_GULOOLJA_000_311<tab>This sounds good, doesn't it?
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_KRILE_000_312<tab>Chances are the data is encrypted. And even if not, it will take considerable time to go through it all.
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_ALPHINAUD_000_313<tab>Then let us take it with us to the Backroom and have Shale analyze it.
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_KRILE_000_314<tab>Agreed.
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_GULOOLJA_000_315<tab>Alright. I'll transfer it to this storage device I brought.
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_GULOOLJA_000_316<tab>There, it's finished!
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_GULOOLJA_000_317<tab>Thank you so much for bringing me all the way here, everyone!
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_WUKLAMAT_000_318<tab>If you're happy, then so am I. Besides, I was able to learn more about my brother as well. It was a fruitful adventure for the both of us.
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_WUKLAMAT_000_320<tab>It seems safe to say my brother returned to Yuweyawata for the tural vidraal. He wanted its power, no matter the cost...
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_GULOOLJA_000_325<tab>Kiluwsa is really good at driving the hover cargo. I wonder if I can learn how to drive it too...

TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_ALPHINAUD_000_330<tab>I'll not soon forget our visit to that facility. It was a troubling reminder of the depravity that can arise from the belief that souls are simply a resource to be exploited.
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_ALISAIE_000_335<tab>I admit the tural vidraal gave me a fright at first. But then I remembered who felled the mighty Valigarmanda!
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_KRILE_000_340<tab>I'm glad we could find what we sought in that abandoned facility.
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_GRAHATIA_000_400<tab>And here we are. The authorities will doubtless wish to be informed about the facility and its contents...
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_GRAHATIA_000_401<tab>But first things first: let us deliver the data to Shale.
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_WUKLAMAT_000_405<tab>Gulool Ja had no trouble keeping up during the outing. He really is his father's son.
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_GULOOLJA_000_410<tab>It was Shale who gave me the storage device before we left. She said that we'd probably need it...and we did!
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_ALPHINAUD_000_415<tab>Having now spent some time in these harsh environs, I feel I have a better understanding of how much of a steadying presence Sphene was to her people.
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_ALISAIE_000_420<tab>From what I can see, things haven't changed much since the funeral. People are still listless like before.
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_KRILE_000_425<tab>I've been thinking, it may behoove us to learn how to use the various devices found throughout Alexandria. Better late than never, after all.
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_GRAHATIA_000_430<tab>The data will be in good hands with Shale.
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_GEODE_000_435<tab>You've found information on Gulool Ja's mother? You lot never cease to amaze...
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_SHALE_000_500<tab>Welcome back. Gulool Ja has already given me the storage device.
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_SHALE_000_501<tab>There looks to be a wealth of data, all of which is encrypted, so I'll need time to process everything.
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_ALPHINAUD_000_502<tab>In that case, Alisaie and I might take ourselves around the city and check on the people.
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_ALISAIE_000_503<tab>Aye, their mood has us a bit worried. I don't know if there's anything we can do to help, but we'll see...
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_SHALE_000_504<tab>Understood. I'll let you know as soon as I've finished my work.
TEXT_KINGMG104_05247_ALISAIE_000_505<tab>Thank you. We'll see you again soon.
